title: Black Forest Cheesecakes
ingredients: 12 chocolate sandwich cookies with creme filling
instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (160 degrees C). Line muffin cups with paper or foil liners. 2. Remove top from each sandwich cookie; crush tops and set aside. Place creme-topped cookies in the prepared muffin cups, creme-side up. 3. Beat cream cheese, sugar, cocoa, and vanilla in a large bowl with an electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in eggs until blended. Fill the prepared muffin cups 3/4 full; sprinkle 1/4 cup reserved cookie crumbs on top. Discard remaining crumbs or save for another use. 4. Bake in the preheated oven until set, 20 to 25 minutes. Cool completely; cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. 5. Top each cheesecake with 2 tablespoons cherry filling and a dollop of whipped topping just before serving.
